Rockstar adds BattlEye anti-cheat to Grand Theft Auto 5, but didn’t enable compatibility with Linux, blocking Steam Deck users from online multiplayer. However, these kinds of problems might not matter soon, thanks to Microsoft’s post-CrowdStrike security plans. 

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9AxTxHDW3U
